long_prompt: A large, ripe watermelon lies on a bright green grass lawn, surrounded by tall sunflowers and other colorful flowers in a lush garden.
A large, ripe watermelon with a deep green rind and black stripes sits on a picnic blanket on a sunny lawn, surrounded by lush green grass and wildflowers.
A bright green watermelon, cut open to reveal its juicy, red flesh, lies on a white kitchen counter beside a bowl of fresh fruit.
